org.apache.james.protocols.api

Interface Response

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FutureResponse, StartTlsResponse, StreamResponse
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractResponse, FutureResponseImpl, FutureStartTlsResponse, FutureStreamResponseImpl, LMTPMultiResponse, POP3Response, POP3StartTlsResponse, POP3StreamResponse, SMTPResponse, SMTPStartTlsResponse

    public interface Response
    Protocol response to send to the client

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Response DISCONNECT
      Special Response implementation which will just disconnect the client

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<CharSequence> getLines()
      Return a List of all response lines stored in this Response.
      String getRetCode()
      Return return-code
      boolean isEndSession()
      Return true if the session is ended

    • Field Detail

      • DISCONNECT

        static final Response DISCONNECT
        Special Response implementation which will just disconnect the client

    • Method Detail

      • getRetCode

        String getRetCode()
        Return return-code
        Returns:
        the return code

      • getLines

        List<CharSequence> getLines()
        Return a List of all response lines stored in this Response. This should be used for encoding the Response before sending it to the client.
        Returns:
        all responseLines

      • isEndSession

        boolean isEndSession()
        Return true if the session is ended
        Returns:
        true if session is ended
